sentences.sentence: T-shirts, the epitome of American casualness, have moved upmarket.
sentences.translation: T恤，美国人的随意的标志，已提升至高档商品之列。

sentences.sentence: The power and ambition of the giants of the digital economy are astonishing—Amazon has just announced the purchase of the upmarket grocery chain Whole Foods for $13.
sentences.translation: 数字经济巨头们的力量和雄心令人震惊——亚马逊刚刚宣布以13美元的价格收购高档连锁超市 Whole Foods 。

sentences.sentence: The power and ambition of the giants of the digital economy are astonishing—Amazon has just announced the purchase of the upmarket grocery chain Whole Foods for $13.5 bn.
sentences.translation: 数字经济巨头们的力量和雄心令人震惊——亚马逊刚刚宣布以135亿美元的价格收购高档食品连锁超市 Whole Foods。
